    • Method Detail

      • genUserId

        public static long genUserId()
        Generates a user id, a 53 bit long. Where the first 32 bits is epoch time, in seconds. The latter 20 bits are first 4 digit of firebase installation id(base 64) loosely converted to base 36
        Returns:
        a unique user id

      • genExperimentId
